item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Grand Princess Is Too Noble to Attain 040***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.nameextend: ***Don’t let me fly—keep me gently and tenderly by your side***
item.description:
Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and “accidentally” provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn’t easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted.

Xu Yitong sighed, “What kind of people like him? Don’t they have enough homework to do?”

…

Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin:

[You’ll laugh, but it turns out I’m the kind of person who likes him : ) ]

[Don’t piss off my husband again, okay?]

“My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint.”

Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted

Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge

Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint

Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: It Was A Fake Marriage, But Jiu Qian Sui Took It Seriously
item.description:
OVERVIEW:

In her past life, Shen Qing Li married her cousin Jiang Zhi Li with a huge dowry left by her father. She thought her new family was kind, but they were all wolves in disguise, just wanting to take her family’s wealth. She not only helped her husband raise the son of his mistress, but the mistress openly moved into their home, took over her position, and even mistreated her child. In the end, both she and her child met a tragic end. In this life, Shen Qing Li firmly broke off the engagement with Jiang Zhi Li and decided to leave with her mother. However, her maternal family set up something unexpected.

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description:
Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don’t go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position.

The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling’s protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body.

Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture…

item.title: Confession to You in Early Summer (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Seven years ago, Yan Wei rejected the confession of her classmate Jiang Youyi, using the excuse that she was straight.

On the eve of the college entrance exams, Jiang Youyi took sleeping pills and was rushed to the hospital, but died despite all efforts to save her. Her belongings included only a diary and a confession letter that she hadn’t given out on her seventeenth birthday.

Seven years later, Yan Wei woke up to find herself back on the day after Jiang Youyi’s birthday.

There was still one year and three months until the college entrance exams.

She wanted to try and keep her.

••••

Things to Know Before Reading:

1. Slow burn, high sweetness, a ratio of nine parts sugar to one part angst, guaranteed Happy Ending (HE)

2. Reformed fake straight top student VS forbearing rebellious tsundere, leaning towards realistic drama, a daily high school romance of mutual redemption, with sweet after-story of changing fate as adults.

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Fake straight woman flirting with a lesbian ends in a crematorium.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Grand Princess Is Too Noble to Attain 020***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princess’s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other’s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
“I’ll go first…”
“I’ll head that way…”

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess’s maid and the second prince’s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: “What don’t you just go to the princess?”
Lu Wuyou endured: “I think the second prince is not bad either.”
Helan Ci: “If we keep talking, we’ll only end up hurting each other!”
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: “Then let it be a mutual destruction.”
Helan Ci: “…?”

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband’s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, “…Can you handle this?”
Lu Wuyou replied, “Even if I can’t, I have to. Who told me to marry you— I’m going to be a powerful minister. I can’t fall here.”
Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Confession to You in Early Summer (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Seven years ago, Yan Wei rejected the confession of her classmate Jiang Youyi, using the excuse that she was straight.

On the eve of the college entrance exams, Jiang Youyi took sleeping pills and was rushed to the hospital, but died despite all efforts to save her. Her belongings included only a diary and a confession letter that she hadn’t given out on her seventeenth birthday.

Seven years later, Yan Wei woke up to find herself back on the day after Jiang Youyi’s birthday.

There was still one year and three months until the college entrance exams.

She wanted to try and keep her.

••••

Things to Know Before Reading:

1. Slow burn, high sweetness, a ratio of nine parts sugar to one part angst, guaranteed Happy Ending (HE)

2. Reformed fake straight top student VS forbearing rebellious tsundere, leaning towards realistic drama, a daily high school romance of mutual redemption, with sweet after-story of changing fate as adults.

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Fake straight woman flirting with a lesbian ends in a crematorium.

1. Slow burn, high sweetness, a ratio of nine parts sugar to one part angst, guaranteed Happy Ending (HE)

2. Reformed fake straight top student VS forbearing rebellious tsundere, leaning towards realistic drama, a daily high school romance of mutual redemption, with sweet after-story of changing fate as adults.

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Fake straight woman flirting with a lesbian ends in a crematorium.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***The Grand Princess Is Too Noble to Attain 010***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description:
Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don’t go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position.

The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling’s protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body.

Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture…

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princess’s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other’s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
“I’ll go first…”
“I’ll head that way…”

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess’s maid and the second prince’s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: “What don’t you just go to the princess?”
Lu Wuyou endured: “I think the second prince is not bad either.”
Helan Ci: “If we keep talking, we’ll only end up hurting each other!”
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: “Then let it be a mutual destruction.”
Helan Ci: “…?”

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband’s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, “…Can you handle this?”
Lu Wuyou replied, “Even if I can’t, I have to. Who told me to marry you— I’m going to be a powerful minister. I can’t fall here.”
Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.nameextend: ***You look so beautiful when you smile.***
item.description:
Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and “accidentally” provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn’t easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted.

Xu Yitong sighed, “What kind of people like him? Don’t they have enough homework to do?”

…

Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin:

[You’ll laugh, but it turns out I’m the kind of person who likes him : ) ]

[Don’t piss off my husband again, okay?]

“My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint.”

Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted

Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge

Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint

Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless—capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder’s script, Sheng Nuan is terrified…

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: “Nuan Nuan, you’re not allowed to go anywhere except by my side…”

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: “Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?”

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: “Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.”

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: “Nuan Nuan, it’s your choice—kill me, or save me.”

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked…

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.nameextend: ***The God of Fortune In The Field of Luck***
item.description:
Ning Yao died tragically.
 The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body.
Ning Yao: “Thank you. I have waited for this day.”
Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart.
 One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars.
 She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him.
 Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened.
 Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia.
 How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply?
 But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan’s ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending.
 And Ning Yao’s lifelong wish is to ascend.
That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao:

“Yao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?”

“If you’re truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft—those fools don’t know his worth. He’s from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.”

“If it works, great. If not… well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.”

Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan:

If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill.

Slay one’s beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past.

A perfect outcome for both.

Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart’s scales.

Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails—desperately resisting his dragon instincts.

“Yao Yao, don’t come in…”

“I beg you… whatever you do, don’t come in…”

“It’ll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside…”

Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if we can both ascend, that’s better than neither of us ascending at all.

So, she went in.

Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness.

After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended.

She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her.

Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time.

Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple.

Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.

Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

item.title: Confession to You in Early Summer (GL)
item.description:
Synopsis:

Seven years ago, Yan Wei rejected the confession of her classmate Jiang Youyi, using the excuse that she was straight.

On the eve of the college entrance exams, Jiang Youyi took sleeping pills and was rushed to the hospital, but died despite all efforts to save her. Her belongings included only a diary and a confession letter that she hadn’t given out on her seventeenth birthday.

Seven years later, Yan Wei woke up to find herself back on the day after Jiang Youyi’s birthday.

There was still one year and three months until the college entrance exams.

She wanted to try and keep her.

••••

Things to Know Before Reading:

1. Slow burn, high sweetness, a ratio of nine parts sugar to one part angst, guaranteed Happy Ending (HE)

2. Reformed fake straight top student VS forbearing rebellious tsundere, leaning towards realistic drama, a daily high school romance of mutual redemption, with sweet after-story of changing fate as adults.

••••

One-Sentence Summary: Fake straight woman flirting with a lesbian ends in a crematorium.
